title: Introduction to Genetic Traits
objectives: Distinguish between inherited and acquired traits
Explain how traits are passed from parents to offspring

sequence.description: Observe family resemblances in photos and discuss similarities
Students observe and record their own observable traits
Class discussion on heredity and trait inheritance
Compare traits with family members to identify patterns
Exit ticket: Distinguish inherited vs. acquired traits

misconceptions: Students may think all traits are inherited
Students may not understand that traits come from both parents
keyQuestions: Which traits do you share with your family members?
Can you learn a trait, or does it have to be inherited?
teachingGuidance.differentiationNotes: Provide visual aids for students who need support identifying traits
